actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to extend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act, as amended, for 1 1/2 years.

summary.text: Extends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act for one and one-half years, until September 30, 1978. Authorizes appropriations under such Act of $43,335,100 for fiscal year 1977 and $47,668,600 for fiscal year 1978.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act, as amended, for 1 1/2 years.
